checkboxes.tooltipText: Check for any missing pieces or stickers.
Verify that no two adjacent faces have the same color.

checkboxes.text: Is the box in good condition?
checkboxes.tooltipText: Look for dents, tears, or other damage.

checkboxes.text: Is the item in new condition?
checkboxes.tooltipText: Check for signs of use, scratches, or damage.
Ensure all parts and manuals are present.
Verify all components from the original purchase.
